res.note: For the Feast of St Clement

rBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L

res.rBody:
Ora pro nobis beate Clemens ut digni efficiamur
promissione promissionibus promissiones Christi

verses.vBody:
Tu autem
martyr Christi beate Clemens martyr dei beate Clemens sacer Christi beate Clemens Clemens confessor Christi ora pro nobis
deum
silent reading
Nos sumus indigni promissa superna mereri sed tu pro nobis funde preces superis
Offert deo pro grege sibi commisso sanctissimas preces
Quam reddet unicuique secundum suum laborem nobis quoque tribuat secundum gratiae dignitatem
Sperate in eo omnis conventus plebis effundite coram illo corda vestra

rep.wit: CAO-C CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L
